A suitcase is a general term for a distinguishable form of luggage. It is often a somewhat flat, rectangular-shaped bag with rounded square corners, either metal, hard plastic or made of cloth, vinyl or leather that more or less retains its shape.
These people are pulling luggage.

A suitcase is a form of luggage. It is often a somewhat flat, rectangular-shaped bag with rounded square corners, either metal, hard plastic or made of cloth, vinyl or leather that more closely resembles a suitcase.
Luggage is a suitcase used for transporting clothes and other possessions.
Luggage is the bags, cases and containers which hold a traveller's articles during transit.
